article:
During the Qin Dynasty, these was once a girl named Meng Jiannu. She was very smart and beautiful. She took care of her parents, washing the clothes and doing the house work. When she  _  up, her parents married her to Fan XIliang  _  , three days after their marriage, officals suddenly broke  _  and
took Fan Xiliang away to build the Great Wall in the north of China.
It was a   _  time for Meng Jiangnu after her husband was taken away-she  _  her husband and cried nearly every day. She decided to  set off  to look for him. Saying  _  to her parents, she
packed her luggage and started her long journey. She  _  over
mountains and went through the rivers. She walked day and night, and finally
reached the foot of the Great Wall.
   _  her
arrival, she was eager to ask about her husband. Bad news came to her, however,
that Fan Xiling had already died of hard work and was  _  into
the Great Wall! Meng Jiangnu could not help  _  . Suddenly
with a loud noise, a 400 kilometer-long section of the Great Wall fell over her
bitter cry. The emperor  _  to be touring the wall at that
exact time, and he was angry and ready to  _  the woman.
However, at the first   _  of Meng Jiangnu, the emperor was attracted by her  _  .Instead of killing her, the Emperor asked Meng Jiangnu to marry him.
Meng Jiangnu  _  on the basis of three terms. The first was to find the
body of Fan Xiliang; the second was to hold a state funeral  for him; and the    _  one was to have the emperor attend the  _  in person. After all the terms were met, Meng Jiangnu jumped into the nearby Bohai Sea.
In   _  of Meng Jiangnu, later generations built a temple at the foot of the Great
Wall in which a  _  of Meng Jiangnu is located. Meng
Jiangnu's story has been passed down from generation to generation.
